content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for the lowest price possible. I could pay around 400 euros.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Maryam, but that's quite a low offer. The location of the apartment, being in the city center, justifies a higher rent. Would you be willing to pay 500 euros? It's a fair price considering the amenities and the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. But 500 euros is quite a lot for me. I could pay 450 euros. I can also pay the rent upfront if that helps.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, while 450 euros is more in line with what I was expecting, I believe I can offer you a special rate of 475 euros per month if you're willing to sign a two-year lease. This special rate is only for tenants who are willing to commit to a longer stay. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds reasonable. I agree to the price of 475 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Maryam. We have a deal at 475 euros per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
